content: pretty picots poinsettia snowflake by jennifer christensen materials  royale metallic crochet cotton size 10 in white/pearl  size 7/1 65 mm steel hook  stiffener stainless steel straight pins a pinning board i cover mine with plastic wrap press and seal works really well follow directions on the stiffener abbreviations yo-yarn over chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch st - stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet skip skip special stitches extended double cluster cluster yo insert hook into st indicated yo pull through 1 loop on hook chain made yo pull through 2 loops on hook yo insert hook into the chain at bottom of first stitch yo pull through 2 loops on hook repeat once more 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops picot chain 3 slip_stitch into back loop of 3rd chain from hook snowflake round 1 chain 4 yo insert hook into back loop of 3rd chain from hook yo pull through 2 loops repeat once 3 loops on hook yo pull through all 3 loops beginning cluster made chain 1 picot chain 1 cluster in 1st chain of beginning chain 4 repeat 5 more times chain 1 picot chain 1 once more join in top of beginning cluster 6 clusters 6 picots 12 chain round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st chain 5 picot chain 5 skip chain picot chain on previous round single_crochet in top of cluster chain 5 picot chain 5 repeat 5 more times join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 6 points round 3 chain 10 picot chain 7 skip chain 5 picot chain 5 on previous round double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 7 picot chain 7 repeat 5 more times join with slip_stitch in the 3rd chain of the starting chain 10 6 points round 4 chain 12 picot chain 9 skip chain 7 picot chain 7 in previous round double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 9 picot chain 9 repeat 5 more times join with a slip_stitch in the 3rd chain of the starting chain 12 finish off block and stiffen according to the package directions making sure to put a pin into every picot in each round stretching the chains out to shape it into the 6 pointed flower shape midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2006-2014
